record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - May 21, 2008)

[Page: S4705]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Dodd, I ask unanimous consent that LCDR Christopher Martin, a congressional fellow in Senator Dodd's office, be allowed floor privileges for the duration of the debate on H.R. 2642.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Alissa Doobay of my staff be granted floor privileges for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that a fellow in my office, LCDR John Croghan, be granted the privilege of the floor for the remainder of the debate on the supplemental bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
